54729908.text: ['Met de betogingen tegen het homohuwelijk in Frankrijk', 'Europe still proves that the long niet zo verdraagzaam is als het zou willen zijn.Integendeel: homohaat heerst he de laatste jaren meer dan ooit.Does he come to the world in a world where he is profiled in a progressive way and is not discriminated against? ']['Al in de Achttiende eeuw', 'met de komst van de verlichting', 'deed het principe van gelijkwaardigheid zijn intrede in Europa.He van overtuigd that all the cafeterias were in the iedereen dus dezelfde kansen en Rechtendeel', 'Europe went to the sea and profiled as a progressive werelddeel.I also have a guarded area with a view to the right to sex and to be the first in the river to have access to the rights of homosexual sex.Niets is less waar: in meer dan driekwart van de Europese landen is het homohuwelijk verboden', 'he became dagelijks meerdere van geweld tegen homoseksuelen gemelded', 'in France vindt de ene na de Andere betoging tegen het homohuwelijk plaats', ' . .. Homohaat lijkt in Europe de laatste jaren alleen maar toe te nemen.It is urgent that the Europeans overheden should take responsibility and opt out of this shameful discrimination. ']['For all Europeans, homosexuality is still taboo.Zelfs in BelgiÃ«', 'was het homohuwelijk al enkele jaren aanvaard is', 'he was still given the same homoseksuelen verbaal of fysiek aangevallen.Homosexuality is said to be the same as the onnatuurlijks of zelfs heathens.Mensen zijn namelijk bang voor datgene was ze niet vertrouwd mee zijn.It is also urgently needed for an over-the-top sensitization campaign in Europe.Men from Europe should be exposed to the concept of homosexuality.This is where the onderwijs plays a big role.Aangezien kinderen and youngeren het merendeel van hun tijd doorbrengen op school', ' oefent dit onderwijs a large invloed uit op hun vorming en development.India children and young people in the open air in a good manner in aanraking come with the concept of homosexuality', 'zou thatt al zeer veel kunnen change.In the less seksual opvoeding en tijdens klasgesprekken kunnen de leerkrachten het onderwerp homoseksualiteit aansnijden.This is a priority for children and young people to realize that it is absolutely not wrong with the lifting of a different gear.Here you have to read the language strictly to opt out of the pestilence.It is important for children to be aware of the fact that they are verbally discriminatory against children.Hoe beter de kinderen van vandaag vertrouwd zijn met homoseksualiteit en hoe meer zij accepteren dat he various gearaardheden bestaan', 'hoe beter hun kinderen daar later mee om zullen gaan. ']['Ok de sociale media plays a crucial role in the sensitization of the European population.Via netwerksites it is possible to get a lot of verbal information and the words will also be spoken for a long time.Europe can here opt out, 'no access to children's sites', 'the use of respectful words.Wanneer we nobody else uitschelden wordt dit still old te vaak as grappig of stoer ervaren', "zeker in de ogen van jongeren.We want to realize that this is absolutely not 'cool' of 'vet' is", 'it doesn't have anything to do with it.']['Ten slotte spelen de Europeanse politici een heel grote rol in het stopp van homohaat.They are always the defenders of Europe and have the right to respect the respect and solidarity that matters to them.There is also a need for many European burgers to be discriminated against.The politics should be heard in the crowds and it is not the same as me.This can be done in many speeches', 'we also have a nonchalant manner in interviews', 'talks', '... There is a problem with the burgers and the discrimination on the other hand. ']['Het is now from the Europese overheden om hun burgers weer pray op te voeden.The burgers are also delivered to children.In late times we hope that the European inner city will be able to see the diversity in Europe.We hope that our children will be able to laugh for many years with the strength of the homosexual sex in the last decade or so.
